title: Sovereign and Old Mill Southern subsets
author: BBT206

posts.post_title: Sovereign and Old Mill Southern subsets
posts.post_content:
I am interested in adding to my Sovereign Old Mill Southern subsets.  If you have any available, please email me at [url]bdbrownbaseball@gmail.com[/url].  I am interested in buying or trading.  Here are a few that I am looking for:

Old Mill Southern

Fritz
Otey
Seitz


Sovereign

Ames Portrait
Bergen Batting
Chase Pink
Doyle with bat
Lake NY
Marquard Pitch follow thru
McGraw Portrait, with cap
McIntyre Brooklyn
McQuillan with bat
Merkle Portrait
Oldring Fielding
Ritchey
Rucker throwing
Shipke
Stahl glove shows
Steinfeldt with bat
Tannehill L.
Wagner Left
Wilhelm with bat
Wiltse pitching
Let me know if you have any and if you are interested in selling or trading.  Thanks, Bill
